articles.content: Cooper FX has just announced Arcades, a guitar pedal that changes its tune with SD card-sized swapable cartridges. Inspired by vintage video game consoles (hence the name) Arcades aims to negate some of the cost involved in traditional pedals — the bulk of wh… [+649 chars]

articles.title: How iPhone SE compares to other 2020 budget phones: Pixel 3A, Galaxy S10E, Galaxy A51 - CNET
articles.description: See how Apple's newest iPhone SE 2020 stacks up against its other affordable rivals.
articles.content: Apple on April 15 announced its latest iPhone SE for 2020, a budget phone that serves as a sequel to its sleeper hit from 2016, the original iPhone SE. For the most part, the new iPhone SE largely follows Apple's original 2016 recipe. Featuring a physical hom… [+4858 chars]

articles.title: Is the grass greener on the other side? | MacBook Pro 16 review - SoyaCincau
articles.description: Rory is a long-time Windows user, but he's always been curious about exploring the mythical world of the MacBook. So, when we got our hands on Apple's brand ...
articles.content: Rory is a long-time Windows user, but he's always been curious about exploring the mythical world of the MacBook. So, when we got our hands on Apple's brand new MacBook Pro 16, Rory gave it a spin. Is it truly the utopia all laptop users should go to?
